events.text:
Take ths portal to get to Ludwig
He is obsessed with content right now
The only way to save him is to defeat him in combat
I have set up some boxes to practice with in here 
They will shake once hit 
So get familiar with your attack range
Check the [color=yellow]control menu [/color]
 to see the controls
(Press pause "ESC" to see control menu)
His weak spot is his hand
So while he is attacking you with it, hit him back
I know you can do it Coots!
SAVE LUDWIG!
